page.description: Bubble help creates a bubble with help text in it whenever a button is hovered over. As with the 'Button text' property you can also use field placeholders in the Bubble help text. For example: See more about {Lastname}. Note: The placeholders are case-sensitive.

section.title: Using a Placeholder for text in a Button
section.description: You can place several placeholders in the bubble help using the names of fields placed inside curly brackets {}.
The resulting view in Live Preview. Each of the rows now has a distinct button text.
